title: i jsut found out something cool about hecarim
body: if you use hecarim and stand right next to a thin wall and there is an enemy that you can see on the other side also standing next to the wall then you can use his E and hecarim will dash over the wall to hit the other champion. pretty cool huh? going over the wall without using up flash or ulti
